audioText: La foule aveugle posait des problèmes de mesure - impossible de compter avec précision dans cette masse.
question: What measurement problem is described?
options: It was impossible to count accurately in the chaotic crowd
The crowd was too small to measure properly
The measuring equipment was broken in the crowd
The crowd was moving too fast to take measurements
explanation: The text states 'La foule aveugle posait des problèmes de mesure - impossible de compter avec précision dans cette masse' - The blind crowd posed measurement problems - impossible to count accurately in this mass. The chaotic nature of the crowd made accurate counting impossible.
